document_data.mainbody: A luzal unba was a tradition of Sauks clan. In rememberance of a dead family member, a warrior opened a bleeding gash from the crown of their own head to their cheek, and let it heal. Sauk opened one scar on his head in response to Kheils death upon meeting Berun, he opened a second one to remind himself that Kheil was truly dead.
